name: WHAMBulance (Mo)
description:
WHAMbulance A game about helping people.

Description

Play as an EMT! Drive around the world to gather patients and drop them off at the hospital! Created for the UF Game Jam, Fall 2022.

Instructions

  • WASD to move
  • Press R to pick up people
  • Drive to the Hospital to drop off patients and receive upgrades
  • Hit people to gather patients
  • Esc to quit

Credits

Programming | Julian, Thad, Marissa

Art | Kath, Morgan

Sound | Seth Lee

[Warning]

  • This game has bugs.
